name: CloSYS Mouthwash, 32 Ounce, 2 Count, Fresh Breath Mouthwash, Gentle Mint, Alcohol Free, Dye Free, pH Balanced Mouth Wash, Helps Soothe Entire Mouth, Fights Bad Breath
short_description: DUAL ACTION: CloSYS Fresh Breath Mouthwash alcohol free in Gentle Mint flavor instantly targets mouth odor molecules and bacteria, providing effective bad breath treatment for adults

product_description: Why do most mouthwashes burn and irritate? It doesn’t have to hurt to be effective. This non alcohol mouthwash for bad breath protects your mouth from odor-causing germs and freshens breath without the painful burn. CloSYS mouth wash for adults and all ages is one of the first to earn the American Dental Association seal for reducing bad breath. Used as oral mouth rinse, it comes mildly flavored with a touch of gentle mint. This gentle but powerful antibacterial mouthwash is perfect for all ages because its patented formula is pH balanced and so gentle you’ll actually use it longer for better results. A 30-second rinse in the morning and evening after each brushing is easy, and all it takes to get great results. CloSYS Sensitive Mouthwash comes mildly flavored with a touch of gentle mint. Nothing overpowering or painful. Enjoy the clean, fresh, soothing enamel repair mouthwash from CloSYS, the Gentlest Oral Care Ever.

product_description: Say bye-bye to bad breath with TheraBreath Fresh Breath Oral Rinse. This alcohol-free, non-burning mouthwash is pH-balanced and starts working instantly to fight bad breath for 12 hours. It’s a powerful breath freshener with xylitol that’s dentist-formulated and ADA-accepted to kill odor-causing bacteria. This bad breath mouthwash has no dyes, no colors, no SLS/sulfates, and no parabens. Adults can rinse and gargle with 2 teaspoons (10 mL) two times a day after brushing; children ages 12-17 can rinse and gargle with 2 teaspoons (10 mL) once daily after brushing. Made in the USA, Fresh Breath is not tested on animals and is certified gluten-free, vegan, Kosher, and Halal. It’s 100% satisfaction guaranteed, so you can add it to your oral care routine and swish with confidence. It’s swishy time with TheraBreath, the number-one alcohol-free mouthwash brand in the USA (based on units sold, Circana, L13wks 2/2/25).
